data.title: 100 Best Luxury Lifestyle Blogs and Websites in 2024
data.meta_description: 100 Best Luxury Lifestyle Blogs ⋅ 1. LUXUO ⋅ 2. Upscale Living Magazine ⋅ 3. Luxurious Magazine ⋅ 4. Luxury Columnist ⋅ 5. Luxxu Blog » Luxury Lifestyle ⋅ 6. Luxe Digital
data.text:
1. LUXUO

Luxury Magazine - News and product announcements - listing all kind of luxury items, from estates, boats and watches, to the most expensive gadgets

Blog luxuo.com

Facebook Followers 313.3KTwitter Followers 101KInstagram Followers 24.7K Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 73 Get Influential Bloggers ContactsGet access to 250k active Bloggers in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the type of bloggers you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share blogger's data in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. Upscale Living Magazine

Upscale Living Magazine, established in 2004, is a premier luxury lifestyle publication that showcases the epitome of opulence and elegance. Renowned globally, it covers a wide array of topics including arts, culture, fashion, beauty, home design, travel, culinary delights, and luxury gadgets. Each issue is crafted with high-quality content, glossy pages, and captivating articles by a talented team of writers, photographers, and fashion editors. Publisher and Editor-in-Chief Alina Cabral ensures that the magazine remains a go-to coffee table book for discerning readers, providing long-lasting value and exclusive insights into the world of luxury.

Blog upscalelivingmag.com

Facebook Followers 28.4KTwitter Followers 28.2KInstagram Followers 14.1K Frequency 9 posts / day Domain Authority 70

3. Luxurious Magazine

Luxurious Magazine, a premier online luxury and lifestyle publication, was founded by Paul and Natasha Godbold. Established in 2004 and rebranded in 2010, the magazine emphasizes honesty and integrity, steering clear of politics and salacious content. Known for its ethical approach, it discontinued its print edition in 2017, focusing solely on online content. Luxurious Magazine is rated highly for privacy and safety, with no trackable affiliate links, and maintains strong relationships with global luxury brands. The platform is dedicated to providing high-quality, transparent editorials that resonate with its discerning readership.

Blog luxuriousmagazine.com

Facebook Followers 30.2KTwitter Followers 6.3KInstagram Followers 1.6K Frequency 10 posts / week Domain Authority 46

A luxury blog focusing on photography, travel, lifestyle, hidden gems and unique experiences.

Blog luxurycolumnist.com

Facebook Followers 30.7KTwitter Followers 83.1KInstagram Followers 184.6K Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 42

Experience modern decor and design settings, sophisticated interior concepts, celebrity house tours, and more in our collection of lifestyle articles. LUXXU is today's most recognizable luxury lifestyle brand known worldwide for its Luxury Design, Quality, and Innovation.

Blog luxxu.net

Facebook Followers 22.3KTwitter Followers 1.7KInstagram Followers 493.8K Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 51

6. Luxe Digital

The perfect mix of modern luxury business and lifestyle stories, featuring the latest in luxury fashion, travel, culture, and business. Luxe Digital offers authoritative insights and opinionated reviews to help luxury decision-makers and marketing professionals win the digital transformation of their luxury business.

Blog luxe.digital

Facebook Followers 24.2KTwitter Followers 44.2KInstagram Followers 15K Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 58

7. The National » Lifestyle Luxury

Get the latest luxury news and analysis from The National, including luxury brands, trends, and insights. Find our latest updates on Luxury fashion and related spheres. The National is a leading English-speaking newspaper and digital media outlet covering the Middle East and the world while based in the UAE.

Blog thenationalnews.com

Facebook Followers 1.6MTwitter Followers 1.1MInstagram Followers 425.7K Frequency 4 posts / week Domain Authority 88

8. Haute Living

Haute Living is a premier lifestyle magazine that caters to affluent and sophisticated readers. The magazine covers a range of luxury topics including high-end real estate, fashion, travel, dining, and celebrity news. With a focus on exclusive content, Haute Living provides insights into the lives of the elite, featuring interviews with top chefs, fashion designers, and other influential figures. The magazine also highlights the best in haute couture, fine dining, and luxury travel destinations, making it an essential guide for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

Blog hauteliving.com

Facebook Followers 80.1KTwitter Followers 26KInstagram Followers 241.8K Frequency 2 posts / day Domain Authority 77

9. Gracie Opulanza

From her personal blogging and work as editor-in-chief / co-founder of MenStyleFashion and SportStyleFashion, Gracie Opulanza began producing recorded interviews with leading industry figures in the fashion and sports fields from mid-2012.

Blog gracieopulanza.com

Luxurylaunches.com is an award-winning premium lifestyle online resource where lifestyle enthusiasts can stay informed on the latest in the world of luxury and opulence. It features the latest and the best from the world of Luxury & performance cars, Timepieces & horology, Luxury hotels, Destinations & experiences, Fashion & Beauty, and more categories.

Blog luxurylaunches.com

The Simply Luxurious Life is an online resource and lifestyle brand by Shannon Ables, author of the book of the same name. Her blog documents her Thoughts & Ideas, Experiences, New Lifestyle products, Upcoming events news, and more.

Blog thesimplyluxuriouslife.com

The Luxury Report is a news website and quarterly magazine aimed primarily at the high net worth individual, available in print and digital. Every edition and online feed covers a wide range of topics, from profiling the most exclusive hotels and resorts, and conference destinations to luxury products and services.

Luxuria Lifestyle provides an all-encompassing guide to the affluent lifestyle, including informative and interesting articles on the world's most luxurious products and services, together with industry news, reviews, features, and exclusive business-to-consumer events for connoisseurs of luxury, corporate businesses, and wealthy consumers from around the globe.

16. 2LUXURY2.com

Best posts and ideas covering Luxury Living, Travel, Food, Businesses, and Apparel. Find daily: news, stories, and interviews among other content. 2LUXURY2.com is a leading digital magazine for luxury enthusiasts publishing relevant, engaging content focused on the High end Lifetsyle.

17. Dolce Magazine

Dolce Magazine, established in 1996, is a prestigious quarterly publication based in Toronto that caters to a global audience with its focus on luxury lifestyle. It covers stories of success, philanthropy, fashion, and culture, appealing to affluent readers in cities such as New York, Miami, Los Angeles, and Vancouver. Dolce Magazine prides itself on bringing luxury into everyday life through carefully curated content that highlights exceptional products, people, and locales. Known for its high-quality standards, Dolce continues to capture the hearts of readers worldwide with its captivating features and exclusive profiles.

Blog dolcemag.com

Facebook Followers 3.4KTwitter Followers 2KInstagram Followers 26.1K Frequency 2 posts / week Domain Authority 49

18. Barron's Penta

These articles from Penta offer useful advice for wealthy individuals on private banking, hedge funds, estate planning and trusts, philanthropy, luxury real estate, art collecting, autos, watches, and more. Penta Magazine is a luxury lifestyle publication that focuses on topics such as wealth management, philanthropy, business, art, fashion, travel, and culture.

Blog barrons.com

Frequency 30 posts / month Domain Authority 88

19. Resident Magazine

Get online access to stories, interviews, andtips that will keep you informed and inspired. Resident Magazine embodies the aspirational luxury lifestyle. Finding and presenting the best in travel, dining, real estate, celebrity news, fashion, and events from around the world.

22. The Luxury Editor

23. Salon Privé Mag

Salon Privé Magazine, established in 2008, is a premier luxury lifestyle publication offering exclusive insights into fashion, arts, culture, and the lives of the elite. With a commitment to excellence, the magazine provides in-depth coverage of high fashion, opulent living, royal affairs, and the world's most glamorous events. Voted the number one luxury lifestyle magazine in the UK by Feedspot, Salon Privé collaborates with industry leaders and renowned experts to deliver authoritative and authentic content, making it a trusted source for all things luxurious.

Blog salonprivemag.com

Our dedicated team brings you the ultimate in luxury lifestyle content and information, while working with companies to ensure their brand marketing, visibility, and growth is at it's best.
